programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: South Carolina Peach-Glazed Ribs with Rice Middlins
programme.desc: When Pat's friends and fellow barbecue chefs, Bryan Furman and Dr. Howard Conyers, come to town, the guys dig deep into the tricks and traditions of one of Bryan's specialties: pork ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Red Curry Braised Pork with Mustard Greens
programme.desc: Pat Martin is in the frozen tundra of Minnesota to visit his new friend, Chef Yia Vang. They brave the cold and break nearly-frozen ground to barbecue a pig's head in the earth.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Bluefin Tuna Collars with Chili Pickle Relish
programme.desc: Pat Martin visits chef Adam Perry Lang in Los Angeles, where the pair cook a prized catch castoff cut - Bluefin Tuna collars.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to a picturesque cattle farm in California's Santa Maria Valley, to hear firsthand from a young pitmaster who has uncovered the secrets of real Santa Maria barbecue.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, & warm donuts with grilled strawberries & whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar & an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa & cheese.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn & Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo & corn nut crusted corn, and bangin' banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: It's always taco night at Chef Dale's house! He turns up the heat with grilled salmon tacos with salsa verde & cauliflower escabeche, duck al pastor tacos with habanero pineapple salsa, & a smokey mushroom queso taco with truffle mole negro.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is back to level up his steak game by grilling up a NY strip steak with roasted onions & poblanos, short ribs with chili paste and horseradish, and a grilled chateaubriand with charred broccolini. Steak your claim on these dishes!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, it's Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern breaks down a whole tuna and serves it three ways: grilled, raw, and poached.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Quail Noodle Salad and Antelope Stew
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern creates Vietnamese cold noodle salad and grilled quail. Next, chef makes antelope stew.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Goat Curry with Rice Pilaf and Carmelized Onions
programme.desc: Chef Andrew butchers a whole goat, using the leg and backstrap for a braised curry.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern makes two different dishes with red snapper: fried snapper fingers with a spicy chile-orange mayonnaise dipping sauce and a slow-roasted whole fish with an herb salad and charred miso sweet potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Striped Bass Crudo and Smoky Summer Succotash
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern celebrates summer's bounty with an elegant bass crudo and a whole roasted striped bass topped with an herb-packed compound butter and served alongside a smoky corn succotash studded with charred poblanos.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern transforms wild duck into a simple grilled appetizer inspired by Japanese tataki and then uses the rest of the duck to make open fire duck noodle soup with fresh egg noodles, lots of aromatic herbs, bean sprouts and squeeze of lime.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern champions the often-overlooked mackerel with a main salad of pickled filets, charred tomatoes, grilled fris√©e, and sweet summer peaches. Then, he grills it whole seasoned with caramelized onions, rutabaga mash and charred grapes.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases quail two ways: classic Southern fried quail with lemon-basil aioli, and as an elevated topping for a traditional open-fire paella, complete with crispy socarrat. He proves this small bird makes an extraordinary dinner.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores Minnesota's forests for wild mushrooms. He creates a simple grilled mushroom salad, then hand-shapes cavatelli pasta tossed with golden chanterelles, butter, garlic, thyme, and colatura. He shares foraging and cleaning tips.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Whole Hog BBQ with Pitmaster Pat Martin
programme.desc: Jess teams up with legendary West Tennessee pitmaster and whole hog expert Pat Martin to cook a hog overnight and enjoy a special cut of beef from Australia.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: In windy Canyon, Texas, Jess visits West Texas A&M, where she interacts with a cloned cow, participates in a blind meat tasting experiment, and helps teach us how to break down a carcass into the cuts we see in the grocery store.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.
